title: Radar satellite companies sharpen focus on military market
summary: The article discusses the growing demand for synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellite technology, particularly for military and defense applications. It highlights advancements by companies like Iceye, Umbra Space, and Capella Space, focusing on their technological capabilities and market positioning. Iceye announced new imaging features for its SAR satellites, but no concrete business deals (acquisitions, mergers, investments, partnerships, or contracts) involving Iceye or other companies are described.
